Keywords: Assassin , Avengers , Deadpool Corps , Thunderbolts , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Wade Wilson
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters, Adjacent
WELCOME TO THE PARTY...WAIT WHERE ARE YOU GOING?: Poison. When Deadpool uses it he may treat characters with a Slice of Cake token that are not within 6 squares as adjacent. // When Deadpool hits, give each hit character without a Slice of Cake token a Slice of Cake token.
FOR ME? YOU REALLY SHOULDN'T HAVE!: FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, Deadpool can use the EFFECT of any equipment equipped to that character and the chosen character cannot use the EFFECT of any equipment.
PARTY'S NOT OVER UNTIL EVERYBODY SINGS!: STOP. Regeneration, Super Senses. // When this click is first revealed, place all opposing characters with a Slice of Cake token adjacent to Deadpool and Deadpool gains Immune until your next turn.
Trade Deadpool Want Deadpool

September 27, 2021
wolfnet2000
having 3 targets with Energy Explosion for splash you can potentially give every opponent a piece of cake token. something I actually managed to do earlier today with this piece.
August 12, 2021
Goop
What makes this piece exceptionally good is that his stop click triggers immune. Once you hit him to stop, there is nothing else you can do to him that turn. Should your opponent heal him at all on their next turn (xmen TA, regen, etc) you have to deal with the stop click all over. Fortunately the immune only happens once per stop click but it makes him a pain to get through. More so than any other stop clicks out there.
